definition[0]: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away
example[0]: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
definition[1]: one of the 13 areas of land on the east coast of North America that later became the United States
definition[2]: a group of people who are similar in some way and who live together, or the place where they live
definition[3]: a group of animals or plants of the same type that are living or growing together
